alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:37PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Okaloosa County through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Wright, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Destin, Eglin AFB, Mary Esther, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Shalimar and Cinco Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
